title: Ep 304 | Phil Is Inducted into the Louisiana Sports Hall of Fame & Jase's Unlikely Baptism Dream
description:
Phil feels unworthy of induction into the Louisiana Sports Hall of Fame, but Al sees plenty of reasons Phil deserves the honor. Jase and Phil discuss why Jesus should be the rock in your life. Jase explains how churches alienate people on the edge of believing and what they can do to fix that. Al exposes the lies told to young girls in women’s health clinics. And Jase has a dream about baptizing a girl and wakes up to discover Mia doing something unexpected.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
